meanings.definition: A very large amount of a substance, typically a vitamin or drug, that is much greater than the recommended daily intake.
meanings.sent1: Taking megadoses of vitamins can sometimes be harmful to your health.
meanings.sent2: Doctors warn against consuming megadoses of medication without proper supervision.
meanings.sent3: She thought taking megadoses of vitamins would make her superhuman, but it just made her sick.
meanings.sent4: His obsession with megadoses of supplements turned him into a walking pharmacy.
meanings.sent5: The concept of megadoses is like trying to fit an elephant into a mouse hole.

meanings.definition: To administer or consume a very large amount of a substance, typically a vitamin or drug, in a single dose.
meanings.sent1: He decided to megadoses on vitamin C to fight off his cold quickly.
meanings.sent2: Athletes sometimes megadoses on energy drinks before a competition for a quick boost.
meanings.sent3: She always megadoses on painkillers before going to the dentist to avoid feeling anything.
meanings.sent4: The chef megadoses on spices to ensure his dishes are bursting with flavor.
meanings.sent5: In the world of cooking, to megadoses on salt can ruin an entire dish.
